video.title: Borgia
video.synopsis: The name Borgia stands for betrayal, intrigue and corruption in the Vatican, which was the center of the world during the Renaissance.

episodes.synopsis: Though officially their uncle, Cardinal Rodrigo Borgia gathers his three children, but Juan's and Cesare's lack of control threaten his life's work.
When a plot to poison the pope is baffled and the pontiff's original testament restored, Cesare watches his brother rise further in Rodrigo's esteem.
episodes.title: Ondata di Calore

episodes.synopsis: A quarrel starts among the cardinals and old reckonings are being settled, while Cesare offers his son as a sacrifice to God, abandoning the newborn.
episodes.title: A Sacred Vow

episodes.synopsis: Rodrigo promises estates and offices for those voting in his favour, and when white smoke rises, he leaves the conclave as Pope Alexander VI.
episodes.title: Wisdom of the Holy Spirit

episodes.synopsis: The wedding of Lucrezia to Giovanni Sforza is to seal the union between the Borgia and Sforza families, but the marriage will not be consummated.
episodes.title: The Bonds of Matrimony

episodes.synopsis: As peace remains brittle, Rodrigo publicly acknowledges his paternity of Juan, Cesare, Lucrezia and Goffredo to strengthen the family bonds.
episodes.title: Legitimacy

episodes.synopsis: Instead of keeping the peace, Rodrigo gives in to Giulia's urging and has his men take up arms, but under Juan's command the campaign fails.
episodes.title: Maneuvers

episodes.synopsis: With his enemies advancing and his troops deserting Juan's command, Rodrigo has to take a tough decision that puts Cesare's life at stake.
episodes.title: Prelude to an Apocalypse

episodes.synopsis: Rodrigo has his back on the wall as the French troops occupy the Eternal City, but thanks to his son Cesare, a fragile peace can be negotiated.
episodes.title: The Invasion of Rome

episodes.synopsis: By the intervention of Spain, France is forced to withdraw, but Isabella of Spain demands a purge of the Jews from the Eternal City.
episodes.title: Miracles

episodes.synopsis: To prove himself worthy of the crown of Naples, Juan proposes to convert the Jews in a mass christening, but accidentally reveals a dark secret.
episodes.title: God's Monster

episodes.synopsis: Cesare leads an investigative commission into Juan's death, but cannot find the guilty party and soon fears he himself killed his brother.
episodes.title: The Serpent Rises

seasons.title: Rules of Love, Rules of War: Season 2

episodes.synopsis: Rodrigo Borgia, Pope Alexander XI, is not yet over the loss of his son, Juan. His powers are threatening to slip from his hands.
episodes.title: The Time of Sweet Desires

episodes.synopsis: When Rodrigo has a man executed for his homosexuality, Della Rovere comes up with a perfidious scheme to eliminate Rodrigo's secretary, Gacet.
episodes.title: Ash Wednesday

episodes.synopsis: By the end of Lent, torrential rains have flooded Rome. Furthermore, the ordinary people feel threatened by a mythical creature with a mule's head.
episodes.title: Palm Sunday

episodes.synopsis: In Florence, Savonarola has a Dominican friar stand in for him in the ordeal by fire, while Cesare's place is taken by a Franciscan.
episodes.title: Pax Vobiscum

episodes.synopsis: When Cesare returns to Rome, the city offers him a triumphant welcome. He regards his success against Savonarola as a turning point in his destiny.
episodes.title: Ascension

episodes.synopsis: Rodrigo has to rely on his secretary, Gacet, more than ever. In order to end Rodrigo's papacy, Della Rovere wants to procure a compromising document.
episodes.title: Pentecost

episodes.synopsis: Under the influence of poison, Rodrigo suffers from hallucinations and embarrasses himself in public, so he elects to undergo withdrawal treatment.
episodes.title: The Blessed Trinity

episodes.synopsis: The Pope is attacked during a public morality play and his outraged cardinals assume that the House of Borgia's alliance with France is the cause.
episodes.title: A Morality Play

episodes.synopsis: Bored at the French royal court in Lyons, Cesare asks King Louis to give him an army that will pressure the Italian provinces to come to an agreement.
episodes.title: Transfiguration

episodes.synopsis: Cesare prepares to march against Milan and forces the Venetian ambassador into a commitment to stop German troops if they should rush to Milan's aid.
episodes.title: The Assumption

episodes.synopsis: Cesare trains a private army in case Louis doesn't send his promised troops; Lucrezia listens as her mother recites the rosary at Juan's tomb.
episodes.title: The Seven Sorrows

episodes.synopsis: Cesare celebrates his victory in Milan by summoning Leonardo da Vinci, whom he wishes to employ as a designer of innovative new war machines.
episodes.title: Who Is Like God?

episodes.synopsis: Rodrigo returns from his monastery and makes Lucrezia First Counselor, while Cesare remains on a military campaign to subjugate the rebel provinces.
Cesare awaits an answer to his ultimatum to Florence, while Rodrigo is stricken ill and Lucrezia becomes embroiled in sexual politics.
Cesare's new mistress could trigger a diplomatic indecent, and public allegations of debauchery are made against the Borgia family.
When one of his commanders captures a city without authorization, Cesare must appease a ruler. Lucrezia's son suffers a potentially mortal fall.
While Rodrigo engages in delicate politics, Leonardo da Vinci offers Cesare a powerful weapon and murder visits the Borgia family.
Outside of Italy, rebellion stirs and the Cardinals fear they’ll lose their power, while plans begin for Lucrezia's next marriage.
Cesare loses his lover and his daughter, leading to a painful defeat, and Lucrezia's betrothal becomes politically and emotionally complex.
Cesare's renegade generals mount a rebellion against him, while those close to Rodrigo conspire against him, all on the eve of Lucrezia's wedding.
Lucrezia meets her new family with mixed results, while at home a malaria outbreak has historic consequences for the Borgias.
episodes.title: 1503: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Rodrigo's death sets chaos in motion on many fronts and forces Cesare to practice his most sophisticated politics yet as stakes are raised.
episodes.title: 1503: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: With a new pope crowned and order breaking down, Cesare finds himself with more and stronger enemies than ever.
Cesare stands trial for treason against the Holy See and the Ten Commandments, with his old friend Niccolo Machiavelli as prosecutor.
Cesare is brought to La Mancha and goes on trial before the Inquisition, while Lucrezia must use extreme measures to save her marriage.
In the season's final episode, Cesare's ultimate judgment is realized while Lucrezia struggles to make sense of her family's history and its future.
